Package com.goldasil.pjv.models

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
com.goldasil.pjv.models.GameModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class GameModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
Represents model for the game play. Holds the states of the basic entity in the game - players, a stock, a waste.

    • playMove

      public boolean playMove​(int playerID, MoveDTO move)
      Makes all changes (of the states of the entity of the game) caused by a specific move according to the type of the move.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player who made the move
      move - the move to process

    • dealCardsAndSetStock

      public void dealCardsAndSetStock()
      Deals the cards to the players. Additionally, it sets the stock and waste.

    • afterMoveCheck

      public void afterMoveCheck()
      Checks the state of the stock after each move. Turns the waste over if the stock is empty.
